reviews_app.tests package

Submodules

reviews_app.tests.test_review_detail module

class reviews_app.tests.test_review_detail.ReviewDetailTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for the ReviewDetail API endpoint. This class contains tests for the PATCH and DELETE methods of the ReviewDetail API.

classmethod setUpTestData()

Set up test data for the ReviewDetailTests class. This method creates test users, sellers, consumers, and a review.

test_delete_authenticated_not_exist()

Test deleting a non-existent review as an authenticated user.

test_delete_authenticated_not_owner()

Test deleting the review as an authenticated user who is not the owner.

test_delete_authenticated_owner()

Test deleting the review as the authenticated owner.

test_delete_unauthenticated()

Test deleting the review without authentication.

test_patch_authenticated_false_request()

Test patching the review with invalid data.

test_patch_authenticated_not_exist()

Test patching a non-existent review as an authenticated user.

test_patch_authenticated_not_owner()

Test patching the review as an authenticated user who is not the owner.

test_patch_authenticated_owner()

Test patching the review as the authenticated owner.

test_patch_unauthenticated()

Test patching the review without authentication.

test_patch_unauthenticated_not_exist()

Test patching a non-existent review without authentication.

reviews_app.tests.test_reviews_list module

class reviews_app.tests.test_reviews_list.ReviewsListTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Test case for the ReviewsList API endpoint. This class contains tests for the GET and POST methods of the ReviewsList API.

setUp()

Set up the test client and authenticate the user. This method is called before each test method is executed.

classmethod setUpTestData()

Set up test data for the ReviewsListTests class. This method creates test users, sellers, consumers, and a review.

test_correct_filter_return_single_result()

Test getting reviews with correct filters.

test_get_authenticated_consumer()

Test getting reviews as an authenticated consumer.

test_get_authenticated_seller()

Test getting reviews as an authenticated seller.

test_get_unauthenticated()

Test getting reviews without authentication.

test_incorrect_filters_return_none_result()

Test getting reviews with incorrect filters.

test_post_authenticated_consumer()

Test posting a review as an authenticated consumer.

test_post_authenticated_consumer_double_review()

Test posting a review as an authenticated consumer who has already reviewed.

test_post_authenticated_seller()

Test posting a review as an authenticated seller.

test_post_authenticated_seller_double_review()

Test posting a review as an authenticated seller who has already reviewed.

test_post_unauthenticated()

Test posting a review without authentication.

test_str_filters_return_error()

Test getting reviews with string filters.
